ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Adventures of a tailor/smithy.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i am on sort of an EQ vacation, but a few minutes ago, i started my EQ client and got as part of the update message, the following lines: ** Trade Skills
ygData.messageBody:
mlockridge01 wrote:

> [...]
> And about reverse engineering. Anyone know much about this? For
> example, I looted a chainmail tunic in Permafrost, but it was too
> large for my alts to use. However, if I could break it down into
> parts and remake it with the correct pattern for a small character, I
> could come out ahead. Any idea if this works?


i am on sort of an EQ vacation, but a few minutes ago, i started my
EQ client and got as part of the update message, the following lines:

** Trade Skills **
[...]
- Tarnished and Fine Steel Weapons may now be recycled into ore
by placing them into a forge with a water flask.

they didn't say "armor", only weapons ... but maybe just give it a try.
i didn't check with eqtraders, yet, but maybe you should have a look
there as well ... and if you tried it yourself, maybe you should post
your results there.


Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 53 female gnome magician
Tarew Marr
